mapper.select: SELECT STUS_CODE_ID AS CODE_ID, CODE, NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0038M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID IN (1,8)

SELECT AGENT_ID, AGENT_GRP_ID, AGENT_TYPE, AGENT_NAME, STUS_ID, USER_ID, CRT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CRT_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UPD_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') UPD_DT FROM SAL0148M WHERE 1 = 1 AND STUS_ID = 1

SELECT Extent1.DOC_NO_ID DOC_NO_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.DOC_NO ELSE '' END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.DOC_NO_PREFIX IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.DOC_NO_PREFIX ELSE '' END C2 FROM SYS0022C Extent1 WHERE Extent1.DOC_NO_ID =#{docNoId} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT A.PORTAL_ID ,A.PORTAL_CODE ,A.PORTAL_NAME ,A.PORTAL_STUS AS PORTAL_STUS_ID ,D.CODE AS PORTAL_STUS ,A.CORP_TYPE AS CORP_TYPE_ID ,E.CODE_NAME AS CORP_TYPE ,A.INV_METHOD AS INV_METHOD_ID ,F.CODE_NAME AS INV_METHOD ,A.LOGIN_ID ,A.PORTAL_PASS ,A.PORTAL_URL ,A.PAYMENT_TERM ,A.REG_PERIOD_MONTH ,A.REG_PERIOD_YEAR ,A.REMARK ,A.RENEWAL_PERIOD ,A.RENEWAL_FEE ,A.CCD_PIC1 AS MAIN_PIC_ID ,G.AGENT_NAME AS PORTAL_PIC ,B.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,C.ATCH_FILE_ID ,A.CRT_USER_ID ,H.USER_NAME AS CREATOR ,A.CRT_DT ,A.UPD_USER_ID ,I.USER_NAME AS UPDATOR ,A.UPD_DT
FROM SAL0409M A LEFT JOIN SYS0070M B ON B.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0071D C ON C.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M D ON A.PORTAL_STUS = D.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M E ON A.CORP_TYPE = E.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M F ON A.INV_METHOD = F.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0148M G ON A.CCD_PIC1 = G.AGENT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON A.CRT_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M I ON A.UPD_USER_ID = I.USER_ID
